statements: DELETE FROM crop_growth_tracking WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' AND timestamp < '2022-05-10 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM crop_growth WHERE crop_id = 100 AND stage = 'Germination';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND temperature > 30.0;
DELETE FROM crop_growth WHERE stage = 'Harvest' AND end_timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM crop_sensors WHERE crop_id = 1 AND sensor_id = 3;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Greenhouse A' AND installation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM crop_info WHERE id = 10 AND growth_stage = 'Flowering';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
